  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String hospitalID, String password, String role, String name, String gender)
      Constructs a new Doctor object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - the unique identifier for the hospital system
      password - the password for the doctor
      role - the role of the user (doctor)
      name - the name of the doctor
      gender - the gender of the doctor
